pullrequest.title: Update code in plugins_model to gazebo8 branch

content.raw:
I think we need to split this into two tutorials, the version on the top says 1.9+ (and even the current tutorial is pulling from 2.2, not sure if they're compatible):

http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=plugins_model&cat=write_plugin&branch=plugins_model_gz8
